SIGW

VALID UNTIL 0655Z

FROM 30ESE MOD-40ESE RSK-70W TCS-LAX-30ESE MOD

FROM STORM PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL 
DETAILS.
